import React, { useContext } from "react" import { ThemeContext } from "../themeContext" function UglyItem(props) { const context = useContext(ThemeContext) return ( <> {props.isEditing === false ? <>

{props.title}

{props.description}

{props.id}

:
New Title New ImageUrl New Description
} ) } export default UglyItem
